data.title: DUKE MEMORIAL - Duke Memorial
data.meta_description: Welcome to Duke Memorial UMC! Sharing Christ from the Heart of Durham. Our Sunday worship at Duke Memorial is traditional, dynamic, and hopeful.  We celebrate Holy Communion monthly, and gluten-free communion is available.
data.text:
Our Story

When Duke Memorial was birthed in 1886, one of its founders, Mr. Washington Duke, believed this new church in the West End of downtown Durham was to be a church for the masses. Today our mission is much the same. Our congregation desires to share Christ from the heart of Durham through our hospitality and welcome, through our worship of God, through our faith in and faithfulness to Jesus Christ, and through our work of compassion, justice, and peace in Durham and beyondâ€‹.
